resources.string: For understanding this tool you have to know the difference between Assets and Liabilities. There are two terms: Assets and Liabilities.
Assets puts money into your pocket.\n Assets provides Passive Income like rental property, stocks etc.
Liablities are those which takes out money from your pocket like your debt,car etc.

Assets provides a positive Cashflow while Liabilities gives you a negative Cashflow.

 When you got more Passive Income than your expenses then you can financially free and you can quit your job.

 Progress Bar at the main shows the Passive Income versus your Expenses.

 Use as your tool to the path of Financial Freedom.
Wish you a very good luck on your journey to Financial Freedom
